nodes.text: We Will Never Surrender was a Rebel propaganda painting that depicted a Mon Calamari Star Cruiser, two X-wings and an A-Wing.
The Aurebesh text on the top of the painting read, "Voyage Home."
We Will Never Surrender featured in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, as a factional item that was only available to Rebel-aligned players who had achieved the rank of Master Sergeant.
